page.title: 04SOCIAL CAR SERVICE
page.content: A social car service operates in Llanfairwaterdine and district. This a voluntary service organised by Shropshire County Council, It's main purpose is to transport anyone to and from General Hospitals for treatment or for visiting sick relatives - if no other form of transport is available. A Geriatric Hospital, 5 miles away in Knighton serves the district, and anyone old or infirm can be taken to this hospital for long or short stays. A small maternity unit is attached to Knighton Geriatric Hospital to cover this area.
